claim: Splash was written, in middle of the night, by Lowell Ganz and Babloo Mandel.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Splash is a 1984 American fantasy romantic comedy film directed by Ron Howard , written by Lowell Ganz and Babaloo Mandel , and starring Tom Hanks , Daryl Hannah , John Candy , Eugene Levy , and Dody Goodman .

claim: Splash was written, in middle of the night, by Lowell Ganz and Babloo Mandel.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film was directed by Ron Howard , who assisted in developing the story with screenwriters Lowell Ganz and Babaloo Mandel .
